content.create:
You are about to create a new remote control, please follow these steps:
{{panel.dialog.step.shutter}}
{{panel.dialog.step.add}}
content.add:
You are about to add a shutter to an existing remote control, please follow these steps:
{{panel.dialog.step.shutter}}
{{panel.dialog.step.add}}
content.remove: You are going to delete this remote control, are you sure?

step.shutter: - Press the PROG button on the shutter's remote control for 3 seconds, the shutter should make a confirmation movement
step.add: - Click the confirm button in the dialog box, the shutter should make a confirmation movement
